sections.heading: Training requirement9-991.Training requirementA professional fire fighter as defined in section 9-901 shall complete training certified by the director of the department of health services on the nature of sudden infant death syndrome as part of the basic training to become a fire fighter
sections.text: Training requirement9-991.Training requirementA professional fire fighter as defined in section 9-901 shall complete training certified by the director of the department of health services on the nature of sudden infant death syndrome as part of the basic training to become a fire fighter.
